video.headline: Valter Walker submits Louie Sutherland with a heel hook
video.caption: Valter Walker traps Louie Sutherland's foot and locks in a heel hook to win by submission.
video.title: Valter Walker submits Louie Sutherland with a heel hook
video.description: Valter Walker traps Louie Sutherland's foot and locks in a heel hook to win by submission.

video.headline: DC stunned by Quillan Salkilld's brutal head-kick KO
video.caption: Quillan Salkilld drops Nasrat Haqparast with a vicious leg kick for a first-round knockout.
video.title: DC stunned by Quillan Salkilld's brutal head-kick KO
video.description: Quillan Salkilld drops Nasrat Haqparast with a vicious leg kick for a first-round knockout.

video.headline: Mackenzie Dern wins the vacant women's strawweight title
video.caption: Mackenzie Dern defeats Virna Jandiroba by decision to win the women's strawweight title.

video.description: Mackenzie Dern defeats Virna Jandiroba by decision to win the women's strawweight title.

video.headline: Tom Aspinall doesn't hide his disdain after eye poke ends main event
video.caption: Tom Aspinall is not happy about hearing boos from the crowd after Ciryl Gane pokes him in the eye for a no contest in the heavyweight title fight.
video.title: Tom Aspinall doesn't hide his disdain after eye poke ends main event
video.description: Tom Aspinall is not happy about hearing boos from the crowd after Ciryl Gane pokes him in the eye for a no contest in the heavyweight title fight.
